HomePage.heroDesc: Fast, high-quality file conversion and compression with no hassle. Upload your files and get optimized results in seconds.

Converter.title: Convert Images

Compressor.title: Compress Images

Compressor.seconDesc: Adjust the compression rate: lower rates reduce file size but may also reduce image quality
